title: AGM Paperwork
content: Below are the links to the paperwork for the Annual General Meeting and Business meeting to be held on Monday June 4th at 1pm at the CRD offices in Ganges.  The offices are at 121 McPhillips Avenue, opposite the Island Savings Credit Union.  For the Business Meeting:  2018-06-04agenda_beddis  For the Annual General Meeting:  2018-06-04agenda2017agm_beddis  If you would prefer to access the documents directly from the CRD website the link is here:  https://www.crd.bc.ca/about/document-library/documents/committeedocuments/beddiswaterservicecommissionssi/20180604
